title: Resolve frontend build/deploy failure by removing unresolved import aliases

requirements.summary: Fix the root cause of the build/deploy failure so the app builds and core routes render without runtime errors.
acceptanceCriteria: Running the standard build for the project completes successfully without errors.
Deploying the canisters succeeds on a retry after the fix (no manual code edits required between attempts).
The app loads successfully after deployment and core routes ('/', '/category/$categoryId', '/story/$storyId', '/search') render without runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Replace the current '@/'-based shadcn/ui imports with equivalent relative imports to ensure bundler/TypeScript resolution works in all deployment environments. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing (shadcn-ui).

Replace the current '@/'-based shadcn/ui import with an equivalent relative import so builds do not depend on an unconfigured path alias. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing (shadcn-ui).
